title: World Wedding Traditions Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of wedding customs and marriage traditions from around the world

questions.question: In Indian weddings, the mehndi ceremony involves decorating the bride with what?
In a traditional Jewish wedding, what does the groom break at the end of the ceremony?
In Chinese weddings, the bride traditionally wears which color?
The tradition of 'something old, something new, something borrowed, something blue' comes from which country?
In a traditional Greek wedding, guests throw what at the newlyweds for good luck?
In Japanese Shinto weddings, the couple shares three cups of what to seal their bond?
In a traditional Scottish wedding, the groom wears which garment?
In Korean weddings, the bride and groom traditionally bow to each other and drink wine from a gourd. What is this ceremony called?
In many African cultures, the 'jumping the broom' ceremony symbolizes what?
options: Sweeping into a new life together

questions.question: In Swedish wedding tradition, when the groom leaves the room, all the male guests do what?
In Italian weddings, guests are traditionally given what as a favor?
In Hindu weddings, the couple walks around a sacred fire. How many times do they circle it?
In a Filipino wedding, which symbolic items are used: a cord, coins, and a veil, collectively called what?
In German wedding tradition, guests break porcelain dishes the night before the wedding. This custom is called what?
In Moroccan weddings, the bride is traditionally carried to the ceremony on what?
